title: The Hodgetwins Reveal What It's Like to Come Out ... as Conservative | Ep 77
description:
In this bonus Ash Wednesday, the Hodgetwins sit down with us and answer some of your burning questions, including talking about how they came out as conservative.

10% off Spartan Armor go to https://www.spartanarmorsystems.com/ and enter promo code CROWDER
